io.straas.android.sdk.messaging.ui.interfaces

Interface SendMessageListener


  • public interface SendMessageListener
    SendMessageListener provides developer events about result of a new message sent from user. You can listen SendMessageListener by put this in ChatroomView.setSendMessageListener(SendMessageListener).

    All of these events would be invoked on UI thread;

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFailure(MessagingError error)
      Called when user sent a new message which failed.
      void onSuccess(java.lang.Void result)
      Called when user sent a new message which succeeded.

    • Method Detail

        Parameters:

      • onFailure

        Called when user sent a new message which failed.
